text: Katharine MacGregor is an American political advisor and lobbyist. She was the United States Deputy Secretary of the Interior from 2019 until 2021 during the first Donald Trump administration. In January 2025, President-elect Trump announced his plans to nominate MacGregor as Deputy Secretary of the Interior again for his second term. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American lobbyists Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Katharine MacGregor
